titleStmt.title: A dreadful account of the horrid murther of Mr. Tilly and the narrow escape of his wife, at the Boors-Head in Lambeth, on Monday the 14th. of May, 1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: At end of title: Lisenc'd, May 16th. 1694.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
